Draft for Enterprise

An ideal digital collaboration layer for stimulating out-of-the-box thinking, rationalizing
group decision-making, and envisioning the best path to achieve your goals.

Contact sales

Event Modelling by Emmanuel Lehmann, Coach DevOps Agile & Craft at Axa PI Planning Portal by Guillaume Decousser, Project Management at Air France Design System by Cyril Bissonnier, Product Owner/UX Design Consultant at Altran

Trusted by leading global brands

Ready-to-deploy

  • SAML 2.0-based SSO

    Connect Draft’s team admin system to any SAML 2.0 identity provider.

  • Fine-grained permission system

    Create shared folders, manage users by group, and assign specific roles based on the level of Team member involvement required.

  • Customer success

    Onboard your team with ease and receive dedicated support and on-demand training to get the most value out of your drafts at all times.

  • Dedicated server

    We can host and manage your instance of Draft on a dedicated server.

  • Jira integration

    Streamline your entire Agile project management workflow by connecting your Jira instance to Draft in just a few simple steps.

  • Bridges with Azure DevOps

    Exchange data (import/export) smoothly between Draft and Azure DevOps.

Discover The Story
Discover more Customer Stories

Keeping your data safe and secure is our top priority

  • Your data is hosted by OVH, Europe’s largest hosting provider, to maintain the highest level of security standard and certification.

  • You have the option to limit login from specific IPs only as a way of both preventing outside access to your data and enabling flexible collaboration within your organization.

  • Draft uses HTTPS protocol with TLSv1.2 or higher in transit and AES 256 at rest.

  • At your request, we can connect the logs to your existing system, so you can create your own alerts and monitoring.

  • You can whitelist email addresses from specific domains to prevent your team members from sharing drafts outside your organization inadvertently.

  • Access periodic audit and follow-up reports on-demand at any time.

  • Draft admins can disable the option to share boards via public links in order to prevent leaking sensitive information.

  • We process backups daily and stock them for one year in a separate and secure location.

Member of France’s largest tech professional
corporation, Syntec Numerique.

Supported by Europe’s largest hosting provider,
part of the OVHcloudStartup Program.
